data.event: Founded in 1811, Lodi is the oldest settlement in Medina County.
The community's name echoes that of the city of Lodi in northern Italy, where Napoleon won a victory in 1796.
In later years, this road became U.S. Route 42.

event.title: hosts the annual Sweet Corn Festival in the middle of July

data.event: Lodi hosts the annual Sweet Corn Festival in the middle of July.
